class.name: SimplePolyline
class.parameter: Magics++2.80 Turn the legend on f

parameter.name: polyline_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the polylines

parameter.name: polyline_line_style
parameter.documentation: Style of the polylines (SOLID/ DASH/ DOT/ CHAIN_DASH/ CHAIN_DOT)

parameter.name: polyline_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the polylines

parameter.name: polyline_effect_method
parameter.documentation: Method applied to draw the line

parameter.name: polyline_trajectory_pivot_index
parameter.documentation: Method applied to draw the line

parameter.name: polyline_trajectory_factor
parameter.documentation: Method applied to draw the line

parameter.name: polyline_level_count
parameter.documentation: Count or number of levels to be plotted. Magics will try to find "nice levels", this means that the number of levels could be slightly different from the requested number of levels

parameter.name: polyline_level_tolerance
parameter.documentation: Tolerance: Do not use "nice levels" if the number of levels is really to different [count +/- tolerance]

parameter.name: polyline_reference_level
parameter.documentation: Level from which the level interval is calculated

parameter.name: polyline_interval
parameter.documentation: Interval in data units between different bands of shading

parameter.name: polyline_level_list
parameter.documentation: List of shading band levels to be plotted

parameter.name: polyline_shade
parameter.documentation: Whether to shade polygons or not (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_max_level
parameter.documentation: Maximum level for which shading is required

parameter.name: polyline_shade_min_level
parameter.documentation: Minimum level for which shading is required

parameter.name: polyline_shade_level_selection_type
parameter.documentation: Can be set to one of: (COUNT/ INTERVAL/ LEVEL_LIST)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the colours of the bands in polygon shading (LIST/CALCULATE)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_max_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Highest shading band colour

parameter.name: polyline_shade_min_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Lowest shading band colour

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_direction
parameter.documentation: Direction of colour sequencing for shading (CLOCKWISE/ ANTI_CLOCKWISE)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_list
parameter.documentation: List of colours to be used in polygon shading.

parameter.name: polyline_priority_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Variable used for setting the priority of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_colour_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Data Variable used for setting the colour of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_colour_list
parameter.documentation: list of colours to use

parameter.name: polyline_colour_level_list
parameter.documentation: level list to use for setting the colours

parameter.name: polyline_colour_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of colours is smaller that the list of levels: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: polyline_line_style_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Data Variable used for setting the line style of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_line_style_list
parameter.documentation: list of line styles to use

parameter.name: polyline_line_style_level_list
parameter.documentation: level list to use for setting the colours

parameter.name: polyline_line_style_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of line styles is smaller that the list of levels: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: polyline_thickness_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Data Variable used for setting the thickness of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_thickness_list
parameter.documentation: list of thicknesses to use

parameter.name: polyline_thickness_level_list
parameter.documentation: level list to use for setting the Thickness

parameter.name: polyline_thickness_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of line styles is smaller that the list of levels: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: polyline_transparency_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Data Variable used for setting the transparency of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_transparency_pivot_variable_name
parameter.documentation: Data Variable used for setting the pivot used to compute the transparency of the segments

parameter.name: polyline_pivot_marker
parameter.documentation: Add a marker to the the last trajectory plotted to materialse the pivot

parameter.name: polyline_pivot_marker_name
parameter.documentation: name of the marker to use

parameter.name: polyline_pivot_marker_height
parameter.documentation: height of the marker to use

parameter.name: polyline_pivot_marker_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the marker to use

parameter.name: polyline_transparency_level_list
parameter.documentation: level list to use for setting the Transparency

parameter.name: polyline_legend_only
parameter.documentation: Wrep only : to build only the legend...
